name: Alta Ventures Mexico
description: Aim to Create a Mexican VC Industry.
tag_list: venture-capital, vc, seed, early, startup, early-stage, venture-growth, financial, mobile, computing, saas, technology, consumer, security, education, communications, healthcare, mexico, angel-investor, venture-capitalist
overview:
ALTA Ventures Mexico is a venture capital firm co-founded by Paul Ahlstrom and Rogelio De los Santos in 2010, it has offices in Monterrey and Mexico City. It provides funding in seed start-up, early and late venture and growth equity-stage companies targeting innovative high-growth markets.

The firm seeks to invest Internet, mobile computing, SaaS computing, technology, consumer, security, education, communications and healthcare sectors.

The firm typically invests between $50,000 and $10 million, usually investing between $2 million and $3 million initially, in companies with enterprise values between $1 million and $7 million.
